notes: 41-year-old obese woman presenting with abdominal pain, vomiting, leukocytosis, urea of 8.5, high CRP, high amylase, Glucose level of 15, and acute edematous interstitial pancreatitis with enlarged common bile duct and intrahepatic duct confirming gall stone pancreatitis.
